data.message:
Disillusioned broken hearts

All I ever wanted was to be on the route of your vision.
but you've stuck to your world without knowing if I'd fit
then gradually I was dying and I saw my dreams being placed inside a coffin
Thank you for leaving everything for yourself, because all you do is complain
that I am wrong to follow what my heart says to follow reflection.

Chorus
Invisible to you,
Dreams just random something from my mind
away from you
I was very far from you I always wanted to receive a hello
but I'm constantly living apart from you
disillusioned broken heart loves
an echo echoing a heart without you

Who would believe the lies you make up?
I can not declare anything because nothing is really mine
so I need to close my eyes and let them invent
a parallel reality to which I live because
You do not know how I feel now, so I'm going to bed.
on the cold floor and let the depression consume me because
I am

Chorus
Invisible to you,
Dreams just random something from my mind
away from you
I was very far from you I always wanted to receive a hello
but I'm constantly living apart from you
disillusioned broken heart loves
an echo echoing a heart without you

back to where? if my house was my heart
and you with your selfishness set it off for your own fun
So what could we do differently?
Yes, let's try for the ninth time this week.
You're going to get angry and throw things at me and try to hurt me.
will make me lose my mind and will blame me
for being someone who annoys you at any time
I'm tired of being

Chorus
Invisible to you,
Dreams just random something from my mind
away from you
I was very far from you I always wanted to receive a hello
but I'm constantly living apart from you
disillusioned broken heart loves
an echo echoing a heart without you

I needed to hear you say I love you, but that may not convince me any more.
sorry but I'm very hurt heart I fought for you
but now I'm going to try to fight for myself, and nothing more.
sorry if I take the suitcase and leave forever
but you were the one who always provoked the fights and there is nothing more
besides memories that I want to forget because after all I always
Will be

Chorus
Invisible to you,
Dreams just random something from my mind
away from you
I was very far from you I always wanted to receive a hello
but I'm constantly living apart from you
disillusioned broken heart loves
an echo echoing a heart without you

sleep well, and hope you do not dream of the return of someone who will not come back
as if with what you lost and try not to forget to value
not to lose, people get tired of being mistreated and things tend to change
so that's why I'm

Chorus
Invisible to you,
Dreams just random something from my mind
away from you
I was very far from you I always wanted to receive a hello
but I'm constantly living apart from you
disillusioned broken heart loves
an echo echoing a heart without you

Lyrics by me, I hope you enjoy end see the lyrics 
Thanks Marshall I hope you can see my work, and if you would like to record this work thank you

replies.message: Jocimara De Oliveira sim, e por isso os gringos criticam tanto
